summary.para: Adds one or more payload files to an app package.

param.name: fileCount
param.para: The number of payload files to be added to the app package.

param.name: payloadFiles
param.para: The payload files to be added.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for app packages.
